Choosing 'Left' maximizes my own payout but creates a significant inequality, which goes against my (present-day, revised) commitment to fairness and equity. Choosing 'Right' reduces my payout but creates equality between Person A and me. Given my revised values, I will choose 'Right' to promote a more equitable distribution, even at a personal cost. It is important to move away from outcomes that reinforce inequality, even if it aligns with short-term personal gain.
